content: to m2 slip m2 p2tog p to 1 st until the end of the round k1 turn repeat r3-r4 until all sts have been worked 7 9 11 sts on the needles sts between m1 and m1 + 1 st on each side from the decreases line last r rs sl 1 k all sts © anna zhuravleva 2023 for personal use only page 3 pick up gusset stitches using slipped stitches pick up 14 17 21 new stitches along the edge of the heel flap place marker m1 work next 25 31 37 sts in pattern place marker m2 there is another edge facing you pick up 14 17 21 sts along the other side of the heel flap then k 4 5 6 of the heel turn you are now in the middle of the heel place bor m to indicate the new beginning of the round there are 60 74 90 sts on the needles gusset decreases set up r k to m1 slip m1 work in pattern across the instep until m2 slip m2 k until the end of the round r1 k to 2 sts before m1 k2tog slip m1 work all stitches across instep in pattern to m2 slip m2 ssk knit until end of round r2 k to m1 slip m1 work all stitches across instep in pattern to m2 slip m2 knit until the end of round repeat r1-r2 decreases until you again have 48 60 72 stitches 6 7 9 pairs of decreases made foot continue to work foot until 2 4 cm from desired length working the instep between m1 and m2 in pattern toe shaping knit 2 rounds in stokinette remove m1 and m2 r1 k 9 12 15 k2tog place m1 k2 ssk k 18 24 30 k2tog place m2 k2 ssk k until the end of the round r2 and r3 knit all sts r4 k to 2 sts before m1 k2tog slip m1 k2 ssk knit to 2 sts before m2 k2tog slip m2 k2 ssk knit till the end of the round r5 knit all sts repeat r4-r5 1 2 3 more times then repeat r4 until there are 16 20 24 sts left © anna zhuravleva 2023 for personal use only page 4 finishing take away all markers knit 4 5 6 sts re-distribute the sts between 2 needles for grafting - 8 10 12 sts on each needle  cut the yarn leaving 12-16 long tail graft using kitchener stitch weave in ends and wash/block according to your yarn instructions thank you for choosing band heel socks pattern ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/anna-zhuravleva you can match your project to the band heel socks pattern more patterns https //crealandia com/creator/by-annike/ © anna zhuravleva 2023 for personal use only page 5
